revised_title: The Electrical Conductivity and Luminosity of Flames Containing Salt Vapours
tldr: The author investigates the electrical conductivity and luminosity of flames containing salt vapors, finding that the presence of alkali salt vapor increases both the luminosity and electrical conductivity of the flame. The study examines the motion of luminous salt vapor in flames due to an electric field, the velocity of positive ions, and the relationship between luminosity and conductivity.
